title: So Tamat, Riot, you fools down for some Team GD vs Riot on SR 5v5 or what?
body: The community is coming back together and props to you guys on working with the community on that. I say we do some friendly 5v5 games with people from GD and Riot. We will get super try hard and use 1337 super Saipan strategies. There are things we could do to put together a few teams for GD to get people playing and other things like shout casting/streaming etc.
